SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_coupon_used_log (f_user_id, f_coupon_batch_id, f_coupon_id, f_parent_merchant_no, f_child_merchant_no, f_channel_no, f_channel_name, f_payment_type, f_payment_name, f_discount_amount, f_platform_cost_amount, f_parent_merchant_cost_amount, f_child_merchant_cost_amount, f_pay_order_no, f_calculation_amount, f_pay_order_time, f_status, f_create_time, f_update_time, f_state) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponBatchId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentMerchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{childMerchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{platformCostAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentMerchantCostAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{childMerchantCostAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{calculationAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payOrderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update t_coupon_used_log set f_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_coupon_batch_id = #{couponBatchId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_parent_merchant_no = #{parentMerchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_child_merchant_no = #{childMerchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_channel_no = #{channelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_channel_name = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_payment_type = #{paymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_payment_name = #{paymentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_discount_amount = #{discountAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_platform_cost_amount = #{platformCostAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_parent_merchant_cost_amount = #{parentMerchantCostAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_child_merchant_cost_amount = #{childMerchantCostAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_pay_order_no = #{payOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_calculation_amount = #{calculationAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_pay_order_time = #{payOrderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, f_create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT} where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select f_id, f_user_id, f_coupon_batch_id, f_coupon_id, f_parent_merchant_no, f_child_merchant_no, f_channel_no, f_channel_name, f_payment_type, f_payment_name, f_discount_amount, f_platform_cost_amount, f_parent_merchant_cost_amount, f_child_merchant_cost_amount, f_pay_order_no, f_calculation_amount, f_pay_order_time, f_status, f_create_time, f_update_time, f_state from t_coupon_used_log where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
